entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
